entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Wiarton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:59 p.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Periods of rain beginning this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm overnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming east 40 gusting to 60 late this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. High 15.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. Local amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 late in the afternoon. High 15. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: A few showers ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Local amount 5 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming south 20 gusting to 50 in the evening then west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
